Creative Coding with Scratch : 1-day experience

March 14th (Sat) or March 15th (Sun) | 9:30-11:30am (Ages 7-9), 12:30-2:30pm (Ages 10-12) | Julia Gabriel Centre, Bangsar

##Details

Duration 1-day experience; 2 hours
Skill Level Beginner
Class size 20 students, 8:1 student to instructor ratio
Ages 7-9 Ages 10-12
Time 9:30-11:30am 12:30-2:30pm
Price RM249 RM299

##Requirements

  • Classes conducted in English and elementary reading level requirement
  • Bring your own laptop (PC, Linux or Mac), power supply and mouse

##Featured Software Scratch (A project by MIT Media Lab)

##Camp Description

This 1-day experience camp is the ideal introduction for kids who are interested in learning to code. For this camp, we are opening it to kids between ages of 9 and 12, and they will be using Scratch (a programming language created by MIT) to learn the basic of programming skills using a simple puzzle-block oriented user interface.

Studetns will learn:

  • Basic programming constructs
  • To create their own interactive game/animation
  • An introduction to cultivate studentsâ€™ logical thought processes and problem solving skills
  • Take home their creation at the end of the class

    • Give them a feel for writing their first computer program using Scratch by attending this camp.
